conbody.p: You can compute mass properties for the entire model or for a selection of 3D solids and/or subcomponents. The values of mass, volume, centroid, moments of inertia, products of inertia, radii of gyration, principal moments, and X-Y-Z directions about centroid are reported in the command bar.

Optionally you can align the User Coordinate System with the inertia axes. As a result, the center of mass or centroid of the component lies at the origin of UCS, which can be useful to investigate the behavior of a product under gravity force.
For more information, see Command Reference (@@@ add link).
